mapper.sql: id, longitude, latitude, province, city, district, building_name, flag_deleted, create_time, create_person, update_time, update_person, apply_id,flag_along_the_street,flag_amend
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into bif_building
id,
longitude,
latitude,
province,
city,
district,
building_name,
flag_deleted,
create_time,
create_person,
update_time,
update_person,
apply_id,
flag_along_the_street,

mapper.update:
update bif_building
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
building_name = #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag_along_the_street = #{flagAlongTheStreet,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_amend = #{flagAmend,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
